page.title: 14THE NORTH SHROPSHIRE HUNT
page.content: The Shropshire Hunt starts at Mrs Roycrofts'farm at Park Farm.It comes to Adderley in March and November.It mostly goes down to our house (Lane Farm) they go to the Conker wood.They always have a drink of Sherry before galloping off. Sometimes the hunt damages a newly sown field,they flatten corn ripening too. The North Shropshire hunt is alright but the horses make a mess. I like the hunt. When the hunt returns they have a bit of lunch.When the hunt is in full flight I watch them over the hedge,but when they start going towards Adderley I go in.There are approximately 16 to 18 horses in the hunt and about 20 dogs in all. But I like watching the huntmen galloping away in their bright red coats and shiny black boots.
